meta.description: Improve how the portals look in your world
meta.long_description:

# Hopo Better Ruined Portals "Piglin Ruins and Corruption" [Now 1.21!] #
üî™ Legends said that many Piglins invaded the overworld, you can find ruins caused by the war with a interesting look.

ü¶¥ Discover the rests: Explore, find, get and discover what piglins have been plotting in the past, examples of loots are: "Obsidian, Armors with trims, Weapons, use your brush and investigate the gravel to get even better items like custom banners, potions, mob heads, sherds, and more."
